sections.name: Overview
sections.contents:
Join a young necromancer who seeks the destruction of a kingdom. Instruct her minions using command cards enscribed with disease and emotion vectors.

Created over the span of a weekend, Lil Necro is a strategic card game that was created using Unity for Global Game Jam 18.

You can download it here. The source code is avalable on GitHub.

sections.name: Responsibilities
sections.contents:
This was a very ambitious project with an incredibly creative content designer. As one of two programmers in the group, I primarily focused on our game's architecture.

Unfortunately, Mark, our lead designer, wasn't familiar with Unity. To address this, I created a small framework to import his designs from a JSON format. This was used to assign each level's dialogue options, victory conditions, and transition links. This allowed us to both realize (most of) Mark's designs within a 48 hour window as well as opened the game up to user modifications.
